message: Starting offer: I propose we divide the funds with an 72/28 ratio. Remember, the value of money decreases by 10% each round.
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of either. Let's try to find a middle ground.
I've adjusted my offer based on the previous round's outcome. I propose a 54/46 split. I believe this maintains a fair balance considering the decreasing value of money.
